title: Identify the Purpose
text: Flow visualizations are used to represent the movement of data or processes.

title: Focus on Movement
text: The key aspect of flow visualizations is showing how data or processes move through a system.

title: Diagram Representation
text: Flow visualizations often use diagrams to illustrate the flow of information.

title: Systematic Approach
text: These visualizations help in understanding the systematic flow within a process or system.

hintAnswer: A diagram that represents the movement of data or processes through a system.
title: Select the Correct Description
text: Choose the option that describes a diagram representing the movement of data or processes through a system.
choices: A diagram that represents the movement of data or processes through a system.
A chart that shows the relationship between different data points.
A graph that displays the frequency of data occurrences over time.
